#include<iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int a[n];
		int sum=0;
		for(int j=0;j<n;j++){
			cin>>a[j];
			sum+=a[j]/(j+1);
		}
		if(sum%2==0){
			cout<<"BOB"<<endl;
		}
		else{
			cout<<"ALICE"<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
